alert.note: Alert for Ascension; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 20 at 8:51PM CDT until June 20 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern West Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... South central East Baton Rouge Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 851 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Addis, or near Plaquemine, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Baton Rouge, Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, Oak Hills Place, St. Gabriel, Addis, Brusly, White Castle, Geismar, Gardere and Carville. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 173 and 181. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ascension; East Baton Rouge; Iberville; West Baton Rouge
